content: {"name": "Falls Ridge Apartments -(Summer Meal Site)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Program runs 7/11/22- 8/17/22", "email": "", "url": "https://www.phila.gov/departments/philadelphia-parks-recreation/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "4349 Ridge Ave.", "address_2": null, "city": "Philadelphia", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "19129", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.0103829999827, "longitude": -75.19719669976975}, "phones": [{"number": "(215) 683-3600", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "16:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}, {"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "19:00", "closes_at": "20:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "All children under 18 are eligible"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "No ID is required."}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Student Meal Site"}]}
